title: Riot Please Cease Your Cooperation With Garena

embed.description: RIOT : Suspend the cooperation of league of legends with Garena

body: Or you can just host your own servers indepedent from Garena.

replies.body: ..They do already? The only Garena servers are Taiwan and SEA, all the rest are run and operated solely by Riot. As I understand it, Riot don't have much control of the Garena servers beyond the actual game content.
I just wish they can remove Garena from hosting SEA.
